item.description:
Thank you to everyone who came out for February's meeting.  This month we'll be reading Major Pettigrew's Last Stand.

In her charming debut novel, Simonson tells the tale of Maj. Ernest Pettigrew, an honor-bound Englishman and widower, and the very embodiment of duty and pride. This is a vastly enjoyable traipse through the English countryside and the long-held traditions of the British aristocracy.

I hope you'll enjoy the book and look forward to seeing everyone in March.

group.name: The Brookline Book Club Meetup Group

item.name: March's Brookline Book Club
